trans-unit.source: Represents the set of arguments that a configured <xref href="System.Activities.CodeActivity"></xref> introduces to the execution environment.
Adds an argument to the collection of arguments of an activity.
The argument to add to the collection.
To be added.
Adds the specified validation error to the metadata’s collection of validation errors.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Imperative Code-Based Validation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The validation error to add.
Adds a validation error to the metadata’s collection of validation errors using the specified description.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Imperative Code-Based Validation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A message that describes the validation error.
Binds the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Argument"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Argument"></xref> to bind.
The <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> to bind.
Gets the activity’s <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReferenceEnvironment"></xref> of arguments or symbols introduced by a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
The activity’s location reference environment of arguments or symbols introduced by a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to this metadata instance.
The object to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to this metadata instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a collection of arguments obtained by using reflection.
This method uses an activity’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> to examine all public properties of type <xref:System.Activities.Argument> and returns them in a collection.
A collection of arguments.
Returns a unique identifier for this metadata instance.
An integer that uniquely identifies this metadata instance.
Gets a value that indicates whether there are any validation errors in the metadata.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation errors are present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the two specified metadata instances are equal.
The first item to compare.
The second item to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two items are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the two specified metadata instances are not equal.
The first item to compare.
The first item to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two items are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Specifies that the activity requires an extension of the specified type at runtime.
If the host fails to provide an extension of the specified type, validation fails.
The type of the extension.
Adds the specified collection of arguments to the activity’s arguments.
The arguments to add.
Adds the specified collection of validation errors to the metadata’s collection of validation errors.
The validation errors to add.
